sentences.sContent: When I'm in Pittsburgh, I call him up.
sentences.sCn: 到匹兹堡后，我会给他打电话。

sentences.sContent: The United States has called up some 150,000 military reservists.
sentences.sCn: 美国已招募了约十五万预备役军人。

synos.tran: 打电话给；召集；使想起；提出

trans.tranCn: 打电话给…某人，征召；征召
trans.tranOther: If you call someone up, you telephone them
